name: Waimanu: Grinding Blocks Adventure
overview: Waimanu: Grinding Blocks Adventure is a homebrew game originally designed as a Nintendo DS title. The team that took it upon themselves to port Waimanu from the Nintendo DS to the Game Boy Advance, is the same team that developed the original Nintendo DS version, Disjointed Studios. To enter the game into a competition run by NeoFlash. Waimanu: Grinding Blocks Adventure takes place on a single screen in which you take control of a penguin. You slide the blocks across to try and squish the enemies that walk around the screen.
